title: The Crow's Nest Inn and Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, International, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegan options include appetizers, and entrees. Some other menu items can be made vegan. Offers vegan specials. Eco-friendly. Opened May-September. Days vary by month. Hours are always 5:30-11pm. Please check website.
